compatibility.notes: CC-BY-NC-SA-1.0 allows for non-commercial use and requires that derivative works be licensed under the same terms. Care should be taken when combining with licenses that have stronger copyleft requirements.

key_requirements: Include a copy of the license when distributing the work.
State any changes made to the original work.
Provide appropriate credit to the original author.
license.name: CC-BY-NC-SA-1.0
obligations: Attribution must be given to the original author.
The work cannot be used for commercial purposes.
If the work is modified, the modified work must be licensed under the same terms.
